column1: Baby Barnaby's////This was my first time trying breakfast here and I've decided to stick to lunch and dinner. These guys make one of the best burgers in town
column2: great meatloaf and the desserts are to die for
column3: but not so much for breakfast. I had corned beef hash & eggs. Was not very well seasoned
column4: I probably should have gone with my original choice if pancakes. My friend ordered w breakfast plate
column5: also needed more seasoning and the grits were very soupy. Grits are supposed to be thick
column6: like stick to your bones thick. I love
column8: love this location and Barnaby's is one of my fav spots in town for lunch or dinner.
